x.name: X
x.description: The pixel location in x direction (to the right) relative to the call-site's origin.

y.name: Y
y.description: The pixel location in y direction (downwards) relative to the call-site's origin.

shift.name: Shift
shift.description: Shifts the rendered frame. E.g. if frame 2 is to be rendered but shift is set to 1 then frame 3 will be rendered instead.

on_fire.name: Draw on fire
on_fire.description: Whether the animation will be drawn if there is currently a fire in the city.

on_crime.name: Draw on crime
on_crime.description: Whether the animation will be drawn if there is currently a crime in the city.

is_burning.name: Draw while burning
is_burning.description: Whether the animation will be drawn if the owning building is currently on fire.

in_winter.name: Draw in winter
in_winter.description: Whether the animation will be drawn during winter.

in_summer.name: Draw in summer
in_summer.description: Whether the animation will be drawn during summer.

seed.name: Seed
seed.description: Random seed value for random dependent stuff like light switching. Can be set manually to let multiple spots behave in the same way.

color.name: Color
color.description: A tint color for this animation spot. This will be applied besides other tint colors like daytime shading and animation color.
